select top 1 a.billno as fixmedinsBchno , #{type} as supnDocType, a.billcode as dyntNo, g.businessname as splerName, '1087165' as medListCodg, '一次性使用组织闭合夹(WS)' as medListName, f.goodscode as medinsListCodg, f.goodsname as medinsListName, case when c.IsPres='Y' then '1' else '0' end as rxFlag, e.batchcode as manuLotnum, e.ProduceDate as manuDate, e.ValDate as expyEnd, a.dates+' '+a.ontime as purcRetnStoinTime, f.Manufacturer as prodentpName, c.ApprovalNo as aprvno, f.GoodsSpec as spec, '100000' as dosformType, b.num as purcRetnCnt, h.staffname as purcRetnOpterName, b.Price as finlTrnsPric
from purinmt a WITH(NOLOCK) join purindt b WITH(NOLOCK) on a.billno=b.billno join goodsattr c WITH(NOLOCK) on b.goodsid=b.goodsid join AngleBalance d WITH(NOLOCK) on b.locatid=d.locatid and b.goodsid=d.goodsid and b.AngleId=d.AngleId and a.orgid=d.OwnerId join batchcode e WITH(NOLOCK) on b.goodsid=e.goodsid and b.AngleId=e.AngleId join goodsdoc f WITH(NOLOCK) on f.goodsid=b.goodsid join businessdoc g WITH(NOLOCK) on g.businessid=a.SuppliersId join staffdoc h WITH(NOLOCK) on h.staffid=a.SaleManId
where a.caozy=#{caozy} and a.orgid=#{orgid} order by a.billno desc
